Departments

The American Academy is proud to have a highly trained and devoted faculty, the majority of whom have master degrees obtained from premiere colleges and universities in the U.S. and several of whom hold doctoral degrees Each of these is nevertheless engaged in ongoing and self-designed programs of professional development that span the whole field of secondary education
